name: Captain CoinCoin
description:
In Captain CoinCoin, help CoinCoin the brave farm duck defend the old farm where he and his friends were born.

Construct buildings, harvest resources, train fighters and plan tricks to repel, in turn-based battles, the strange machines that want your land.

Campaign map:


Help CoinCoin prepare defenses. Each day is divided into three stages, morning, day and evening. In the morning, you have the opportunity to see the upcoming movements of enemies. During the day, the fully recharged machines take action and rush towards their objectives. In the evening, everyone rests, allied and enemy fighters regain part of their life points.

Prepare to face the climate of the different seasons which will modify the map (freezing water in winter, windswept desert in autumn, etc.) and affect the collection of resources.



Establish outposts using relays so you can expand. Give room to your most advanced constructions to allow you to gain the upper hand over your enemies.

Combat and fighters:


Prepare tricks and powers in your utility buildings, such as ambushes or celebrations. This will be essential to ensure the good survival of your herd.
Be careful, if one of your fighters or one of your strongholds comes into contact with the enemy you will have to face him in a turn-based battle, the environment of which depends on the adjacent hexagons and offers different cover and obstacles.
Over time, your fighters will be able to acquire essential equipment and skills to overcome increasingly strong enemies. Use the supplies you have created to deploy all the ingenuity of your little recruits.



You will also have the opportunity to resolve battles automatically if the odds are in your favor. Here again, supplies can weigh in the balance, increasing your chances of victory.

Map Creation :


Finally, create your own maps to explore all the possibilities and, thus, prepare yourself for the worst-case scenario.



We are just waiting for you to defend our farm.
